trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Southlake
There were no other sightings in Southlake on or around February 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsME AND MY 3 FRIENDS WERE WALKING WHEN A SPHERICAL OBJECT WITH LIGHTS WAS IN THE SKY AND WAS GETTING CLOSER BY THE MINUTE THEN IT WAS PROBALY 20 FEET ABOVE US THEN A LIGHT FORMED AROUND US AND WE WERE SUCKED INTO THERE SHIP. WE COULDNT TELL WHAT THEY WERER SAYING IT WAS SOME TYPE OF DIFFERENT LANGUAGE. I THINK THEY THREATENED TO KILL US IF WE DIDNT TAKE THEM TO OUR LEADER. MY FRIED STANLEY WAS FREAKING OUT SO HE PUNCHED THE TWO ALIENS IN THE FACE AND PRESSED THE BUTTON TO SEND US BACK OUT OF THE SHIP AFTER THAT WE ALL WERE FREAKED OUT AND WENT HOME AND TOLD OUR OTHER FRIENDS ABOUT IT.
